verses.arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
verses.translation: Was there not a period of time when man was not a thing [even] mentioned[1]?

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We created man from a drop of mixed fluids[2], in order to test him. So We gave him hearing and sight.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We showed him the way, whether he is grateful or ungrateful.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: We have surely prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a Blazing Fire.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] flavored with camphor[3],

verses.arabic_text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
verses.translation: a spring from which Allah’s slaves will drink, which will flow as they wish.

verses.arabic_text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا
verses.translation: They fulfill their vows and fear a Day whose evil will spread far and wide,

verses.arabic_text: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: and they give food, despite their love for it[4], to the needy, the orphans, and the captives,

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: [saying to themselves] “We feed you only for the sake of Allah; we seek from you neither reward nor gratitude.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: We fear from our Lord a grim and distressful Day.”

verses.arabic_text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
verses.translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day, and will grant them radiance and delight,

verses.arabic_text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: and will reward them for their perseverance with Paradise and garments of silk.

verses.arabic_text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: They will recline therein on adorned couches; neither feeling scorching heat[5] nor freezing cold.

verses.arabic_text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
verses.translation: with shady branches spread above them, and clusters of fruit will be made within their reach.

verses.arabic_text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: They will be served frequently with silver vessels and crystal cups,

verses.arabic_text: قَوَارِيرَاْ مِن فِضَّةٖ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِيرٗا
verses.translation: crystalline goblets of silver, filled precisely as desired.

verses.arabic_text: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: They will be given a glass [of wine] flavored with ginger

verses.arabic_text: عَيۡنٗا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: from a spring therein called Salsabīl.

verses.arabic_text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا
verses.translation: They will be served by eternal young boys; if you see them, you would think that they are scattered pearls.

verses.arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: If you were to look around, you would see bliss and a vast dominion.

verses.arabic_text: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: They will be dressed in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a pure drink.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
verses.translation: [And they will be told,] “Indeed, this is your reward, and your efforts have been appreciated.”

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We Who have sent down the Qur’an to you in stages.

verses.arabic_text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا
verses.translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not obey any sinner or disbeliever from among them.

verses.arabic_text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
verses.translation: And remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening[6],

verses.arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: and prostrate to Him at night, and glorify Him at length by night[7].

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, these [pagans] love this fleeting life and pay no heed to a heavy Day ahead of them.

verses.arabic_text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
verses.translation: It is We Who created them and strengthened their build. If We will, We can replace them with others like them.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder; so let anyone who wills may take a way to his Lord.

verses.arabic_text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
verses.translation: But you cannot will unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

verses.arabic_text: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
verses.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy, but for the wrongdoers He has prepared a painful punishment.
